subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
Hockey, Ice
Economic Conditions and Trends
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. and N.H.L. have enjoyed thrilling postseasons so far this spring, but is that simply the playoff electricity before the budget-crunching storm?
